Celebrate Summer with Watermelon Feta and Mint Salad


Ingredients
1 (3 pound) watermelon, cut into 1-inch cubes and chilled
1/4 cup extra virgin olive oil
2 tablespoons lemon juice
1 teaspoon lemon zest
1/2 teaspoon kosher salt
freshly ground ground black pepper to taste
4 ounces feta cheese, coarsely crumbled
1/4 cup mint leaves

Cooking Instructions

Place the chilled watermelon cubes in a large bowl. Whisk
olive oil, lemon juice, lemon zest, kosher salt, and black
pepper together in a small bowl. Just before serving,
drizzle dressing over chilled watermelon, and toss gently.
Sprinkle feta cheese and mint over the watermelon, but do
not mix in. Serve immediately.
